metadata.title: CVE-2019-14824 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the 'deref' plugin of 389-ds-base where it could use the 'search' permission to display attribute values. In some configurations, this could allow an authenticated attacker to view private attributes, such as password hashes.

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4.2.4-1').
